definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: Place on a prepared tray, brush the tops lightly with egg.
sentences.chinese: 放在鋪好烤紙的烤盤上，刷上蛋液入預熱烤箱。

sentences.english: Turn the throttle twist grip properly to continue preheating the engine for 1-3 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 適度扭動轉把式油門使發動機持續預熱1至3分鐘。

sentences.english: Preheater and calciner is key equipment for precalcing production technique.
sentences.chinese: 預熱器和分解爐是新型幹法水泥生產技術的核心設備。

sentences.english: His ear okayed the sounds as the engine warmed up.
sentences.chinese: 他的耳朵聽出發動機預熱時發出的聲音是正常的。

sentences.english: The combustor is of the vaporiser type, and hence is equipped with three preheat burners.
sentences.chinese: 燃燒室是汽化器的類型，因此是有三個預熱刻錄機。

sentences.english: So It induction heating is a feasible method to use.
sentences.chinese: 因此採用感應方式來預熱加熱板是一種可行的方法。

sentences.english: Preheating shall also be applied to the tack welding, when the weldment requires preheating.
sentences.chinese: 需要預熱的焊件，定位焊時也應按規定進行預熱。

sentences.english: Preheating shall also be applied to the tack welding, when the weldment requires preheating.
sentences.chinese: 需要預熱的焊件，定位焊時也應按規定進行預熱。

sentences.english: The processes of preheating and welding of super scale penstocks were detailed.
sentences.chinese: 本文詳細敘述了巨型壓力鋼管的預熱裝配和焊接過程。

sentences.english: But even so, FIM's revenue engine is just warming up.
sentences.chinese: 但FIM的營收機器還剛剛進入預熱階段。

sentences.english: Second, we should consider the use of preheating.
sentences.chinese: 其次還應考慮利用預熱問題。

sentences.english: Cook the pie for 20 minutes in a pre-heated oven.
sentences.chinese: 在經過預熱的烤箱裏烘烤餡餅20分鐘。

sentences.english: Place in a pre-heated 190 degrees oven and bake for twelve minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把餅乾放入預熱過的烤箱，烤12分鐘，190度。

sentences.english: Preheat waffle iron to medium high.
sentences.chinese: 將華夫鐵板調至中溫預熱。

sentences.english: Preheat gas oven to 180℃ and grease a cookies sheet.
sentences.chinese: 預熱煤氣焗爐至攝氏180℃，把焗盤掃油。

sentences.english: Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until firm.
sentences.chinese: 在預熱好的烤箱裏烘焙8到10分鐘，直到薑餅定型。

definition: to take out of the furnace/fresh out of the oven/fig. newly announced/recently made available
to ignite/to light a fire/to agitate/to start an engine/ignition/fig. to stir up trouble
reversal/inversion/to reverse/to invert (upside down, inside out, back to front, white to black etc)
to heat/to add warmth/to raise temperature/fig. to stimulate
preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
